note.p: Irish-born butler and publican. Employed by the Isherwood family, 105 Eaton Place, London, 1871; by Gertrude Susan Astley, 33 Prince’s Gardens, London, 1881. Married Eliza Keen (1840/1–1930) at St Aloysius’s Roman Catholic chapel, London, in 1879. Publican at the Builders’ Arms, 68 West Street, Portsmouth, from at least 1883.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/114/71/5), 1881 (RG11/121/21/37, RG11/1157/42/34), 1891 (RG12/870/54/23), 1901 (RG13/1005/29/5)
certificate of birth, William George Jennings, 17 January 1883, Portsea Island (General Register Office, England)
certificate of marriage, William Jennings to Eliza Keen, 1 March 1879, St Pancras, Middlesex (General Register Office, England)
